about_the_game:
THRILLKINGS is a fast-paced arena first-person shooter, inspired by games from the early 2000s, where mastering your character's movement and controlling all available arsenal is the key to total dominance.

  • Play on a variety of modes like classic Deathmatch and Team Deathmatch, plus new modes like King of The Thrill, where players compete to hold control of the "Thrill", a capture point that serves also as a drivable combat vehicle and can be used and exploited as a deadly weapon.

  • Move at full speed with classic mechanics like bunny hopping, strafe jumping, rocket jumps, and precise air control which allows total 360° vertical view rotation in first person.

  • Jump and move even faster with the Impulse Rifle, which allows you to grab objects around your environment and use them as projectiles, and change trajectory in a matter of seconds.

  • Enjoy playing competitive with friends Online, or with Local Area Network support for old school LAN parties.

  • 8 weapons, 4 maps and 2 Thrills available on Early Access, with many more already in the pipeline and coming soon!

The game is currently on Early Access with much more to come. Please join us on the development and get future updates through Steam and Discord!

content_descriptors.notes: There is no sexual content of any kind in the game. The game has gore effects like blood and limbs flying when the player's body gets in contact with explosives like grenades or bullets. The game contains no depictions of drugs or alcohol.

THRILLKINGS is a fast-paced arena first-person shooter, inspired by games from the early 2000s, where mastering your character's movement and controlling all available arsenal is the key to total dominance.

  • Play on a variety of modes like classic Deathmatch and Team Deathmatch, plus new modes like King of The Thrill, where players compete to hold control of the "Thrill", a capture point that serves also as a drivable combat vehicle and can be used and exploited as a deadly weapon.

  • Move at full speed with classic mechanics like bunny hopping, strafe jumping, rocket jumps, and precise air control which allows total 360° vertical view rotation in first person.

  • Jump and move even faster with the Impulse Rifle, which allows you to grab objects around your environment and use them as projectiles, and change trajectory in a matter of seconds.

  • Enjoy playing competitive with friends Online, or with Local Area Network support for old school LAN parties.

  • 8 weapons, 4 maps and 2 Thrills available on Early Access, with many more already in the pipeline and coming soon!

The game is currently on Early Access with much more to come. Please join us on the development and get future updates through Steam and Discord!
name: THRILLKINGS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X / Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT 6GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X / Intel Core i7-9700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT 8GB / NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 12GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5100 MB available space

short_description: THRILLKINGS is a fast-paced Arena FPS with a set of weapons and movement inspired by games from the early 2000s. Compete in classic and new game modes, dominate your enemies through a variety of maps with unique traversal mechanics, and become the ultimate King.
